epic.title: Core Image Sharing and Discovery
epic.description: Enable users to share and discover images through pins and boards, similar to Pinterest's core functionality.
features: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

stories.title: Implement User Image Upload and Pin Creation
stories.description: Allow users to upload images, add descriptions, and create pins that can be saved to boards.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload images in JPEG and PNG formats up to the defined size limit (e.g., 5MB).
Users can enter a title and description for each pin.
Uploaded pins appear on the user's profile page.
Pins are properly categorized under the user's boards.
Image upload should complete within 3 seconds for images under 5MB in size.
System supports at least 10,000 concurrent uploads without performance degradation.

tasks.title: Frontend: Build Image Upload UI
tasks.description: Create a responsive UI component for selecting an image file, adding a title and description, and saving as a pin.
tasks.feature: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

tasks.title: Backend: Implement Image Upload API
tasks.description: Develop a backend API endpoint to handle image uploads, metadata, and linking to user profiles/boards.
tasks.feature: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

tasks.title: Backend: Integrate Image Storage Service
tasks.description: Integrate with an image storage service (e.g., AWS S3) for scalable and reliable storage of uploaded files.
tasks.feature: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

tasks.title: QA: Test Image Upload and Pin Creation
tasks.description: Write and execute test cases to ensure upload functionality works as expected, meets performance goals, and handles concurrent uploads.
tasks.feature: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

stories.feature: User Image Upload and Pin Creation

notes: The requirement is high-level and vague; assumed core functionality is similar to Pinterest's pin creation feature. Dependencies include user authentication and an image storage service. Non-functional requirements include a 3-second upload time for images under 5MB and support for 10,000 concurrent uploads.
